Experience.title: Wharton Customer Analytics - Senior Analyst
content: Worked with McDonalds (client) in order to determine how their social media marketing campagins impact their brand affinity and revenue streams.
Created ARIMAX model to forecast sales with 93% accuracy based on exogenous variables derived from McDonald's social media data.
Generated recommendations for future social media campagins to increase sales and presented findings to client

Experience.title: NASA - Software Engineering Intern
content: Developed full-stack platform to manage real time aerial vehicles using React, Express.js, Node.js, SQL and AWS DynamoDB.
Developed frontend framework to simulate and track potential collisions and flight plan mis-compliances, visualizing results with Google Maps API.
Integrated an existing Single Sign On (SSO) service deployed via AWS in order to provide role-based access to interface.
